question: The policy proved impossible to ___ and so was abandoned.
All new employees are required to ___ a medical examination.
The new king was easily ___ by his advisers into doing what they wanted.
In his speech, he failed to ___ the critisms that had been aimed at him.
The engineers had to ___ an temporary, emergency bridge over the river.
The new literacy program will be ___ by a group of NGOs.
In the 1960s President John F. Kennedy ___ a number of civil rights laws.
We needed to ___ the video so we could show it to several groups.
The politician ___ a smear campaign against his rivals.
The Prime Minister announced that he would ___ a new policy on education.
